title: Fake player bots.
body: Just want to know if I'm the only person that's noticed a huge amount of bots in coop v ai lately especially late at night. For the 2nd night in a row I've had a game where I am the only human player in coop v ai... Also is there anything I can do other then just reporting every one of them under cheater and saying "Xp farming bot"?

replies.body: Reporting does not do anything and there is no point of doing so as I've made multiple reports of the same scripters yet I see them over and over again.

Hey there,

The best thing to do is to continue to report these players under Cheating as you have already been doing.

If you wish to submit a further report with any evidence you have to include, please feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support and they will forward the information to the correct team.
